documents.document: @justgoodfriend3 Fab day today, can't believe it's a year already. Thanks to those who made it happen, something new every week, love it!!

@justgoodfriend3 and well deserved, thanks for all you Cath & Mary do to brighten our Thursdays.
@redragonimages WOW, wish I had a few of those!! #feather duster #lovewales
RIP Rick Parfitt, sad loss to the world of 'rockin' all over the world' #StatusQuo
@justgoodfriend3 Ab Fab party today with good friends, fun, laughs and lovely Xmas dinner. Thanks Elaine, Cath, Mary, Elvis , Santa & elves.
@justgoodfriend3 another great morning with friends and a coffee listenening to a lovely lady talking about German Christmas traditions.
@justgoodfriend3 thoroughly enjoyed our afternoon tea and thanks to David for the interesting tour and talk. #mansionhousecardiff
@AussieGrit been there 3 times, never again!!! Know exactly how you're feeling. Still miss our Rottie terribly and it's been 6 years
So, so pleased for u @nico_rosberg u kept that little s..t out of the #WorldChampionship. Enjoy your #victory #AbuDhabiGP
@justgoodfriend3 another great morning, thanks to all who made it happen #good times
OMG FIFA get a grip. Poppies are not a political statement they're a symbol of respectful rememberance for our war dead, pathetic#lovewales
@welshrugbyunion. Only just by the skin of your teeth. Not looking forward to the SA game even though they're not at their best.#walesvjapan
@justgoodfriend3 well done again Cath & Elaine, you always make us laugh. Thoroughly enjoyed #karaoke this morning #happydays
@wru shocking display today Wales.....shocking. Not looking forward to the 6 nations!!!
Good win for Cardiff City FC today 2 - 1 against Nottingham. Keep it up boys #Bluebirds #CCFC
@richardparks can't wait for this one, think u need a bit more practice ha, ha #extremewales #EPIC #lovewales #BBC

@richardparks take all the R&R u want, glad you're ok and back with us. #lovewales #epic
